name: tourguard
description: TourGuard - Bergtour Sicherheitssystem mit GPS-Tracking und Notfall-Benachrichtigungen

scripts.test:coverage: npm run test:frontend -- --coverage && npm run test:backend -- --coverage
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.lint: cd frontend && npm run lint && cd ../backend && npm run lint
scripts.db:setup: docker-compose exec backend npm run db:migrate && docker-compose exec backend npm run db:seed
scripts.db:reset: docker-compose exec backend npm run db:migrate:rollback && npm run db:setup

author: TourGuard Team
